projectCategory.title: What kind of project is this?

Data collection and curation.title: Will you require Data collection and curation?
enum: Data curation and management - small consortia or supplemental project
Data curation and management - large consortia

Data platform integration.title: Will you require Data platform integration?
enum: Utilizing an existing pattern (e.g. passing manifest via DRS)
Will require a new platform integration pattern (e.g. not utilizing DRS)

Data processing.title: Will you require Data processing?
enum: New Nextflow workflows need to be created

Data Quality Control.title: Will you require Data Quality Control?
Data Quality Control.default: No Expected Need for Data Quality Control by DPE
enum: No Expected Need for Data Quality Control by DPE

R/Python client features.title: Will you require R/Python client features?

Data portal.title: Will you require Data portal?
enum: Existing Portal Maintenance w/ Minor New Features
Portal Feature (Add-on to Data Portal) Cohort Builder
New Feature (e.g. First Time Making Cohort Builder)

Scientific project management.title: Will you require Scientific project management?
Scientific project management.default: No Scientific Project Management is Needed
enum: No Scientific Project Management is Needed

IRB Protocol Development, Submission, Re.title: Will you require IRB Protocol Development, Submission, Renewals?
enum: If Sage is PI, co-PI / Data Contributor/ Data Controller

Legal review of applicable regulations.title: Will you require Legal review of applicable regulations?
enum: When Sage is Project Collaborator / Data Controller

Establish Community Governance Strategy.title: Will you require Establish Community Governance Strategy?
enum: New DCC - US Data in Synapse (small consortia)
New DCC - US Data in Synapse (large consortia)
New DCC in Synapse - US & International Data Contributors (small Consortia)
New DCC in Synapse - US & International Data Contributors (large Consortia)

otherProjectCategory.title: Please specify the type of project

enum: Data curation and management - small consortia or supplemental project
